Class ApplyMeteorShowerEffectRequest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.network.requests.Request
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.network.requests.game_requests.adventure.ApplyMeteorShowerEffectRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ApplyMeteorShowerEffectRequest extends Request
Represents a request to apply the effect of a meteor shower card in the game. This request extends the Request class and is specifically designed to handle the effect of a meteor shower card when executed by the appropriate game controller.
See Also:

    • ApplyMeteorShowerEffectRequest

      public ApplyMeteorShowerEffectRequest(int senderId, Card card)
      Constructs a new ApplyMeteorShowerEffectRequest to apply the effect of a Meteor Shower card in the game.
      Parameters:
      senderId - The unique identifier of the player sending this request.
      card - The Card object representing the Meteor Shower card associated with the request.

  • Method Details

      public Card getCard()
      Retrieves the Card object associated with this request.
      Returns:
      The Card object representing the card that is being applied or managed as part

    • execute

      public void execute(Controller controller)
      Executes the specific behavior associated with the ApplyMeteorShowerEffectRequest. If the provided controller is an instance of GameController, it triggers the handling of the meteor shower effect using this request.
      Specified by:
      execute in class Request
      Parameters:
      controller - The Controller instance responsible for managing the execution of the request. This should typically be a GameController instance.
